lines.line: Dear fellow citizen, I salute you ! I’m Teddy, and I represent the workers of this village. I’ve heard from my associates that you would move in Vie-Lhaj. I’m so glad to meet you.
Would you like a cup of coffee ?

choices.answer: Do you intend to run in the local elections ?

lines.line: Of course I’m running. Do you really thing this useless mayor would help our beautiful village, m’lady ? You see, I am the Republic, madam, and I know what is it that citizens want. I hear them, and I promise I will change everything, I will make these lands great again, I will create a great nation !

Well, of course I pull the string. Maybe you already met him, but if you go to the main square, you can talk to the oldest soul around here. Mister Mayor is angry at me, because, for the next elections, I’m using the wise precepts of the old sage : his words are very useful for me.

choices.answer: I wanted to say that I find you very cute.

lines.line: Madam, you can’t say that ! I won’t permit it ! Do not reduce me to my cuteness, and stop looking at me this way !

Poppy ? Of course I know him. I love this guy. Thanks to him, my flowers have regained their youth. It’s incredible how his feces are full of nutriments ! Since he came, we often take coffee and cigarette together ; my plants are very grateful.
